name: The Ultimate Memory Adventure
description:
A simple, yet enjoyable game made in under 24 hours, with 3 premade tilesets.

Gameplay is quite simple - pick your difficulty setting:

  • Easy - 4x4
  • Medium - 6x6
  • Hard! - 8x8

.. and then just find pairs of pictures, by clicking on them with your mouse.

After completion of chosen diffuculty level the amount of time which took you to complete the puzzle will be displayed. Feel free to share your score in the comments!

Enjoy!

(music comes from opengameart.org)
